Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
hac.controllers.LobbyController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/lobby") public class LobbyController extends Object
The lobby controller

  • Method Details

    • getLobby

      @GetMapping("") public String getLobby()
      The rest returns the lobby home page.
      Returns:
      The lobby page html.

    • getErrorLobby

      @GetMapping("/error-message") public String getErrorLobby(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The rest returns a lobby page with The room been closed error message.
      Parameters:
      model - To add the parameters to the thymeleaf page generation.
      Returns:
      The lobby Html with the error message.

    • getRooms

      @GetMapping("/getRooms") @ResponseBody public List<Map<String,String>> getRooms()
      The rest return a JSON that contains all the rooms in the database which their status is: WAITING_FOR_NEW_PLAYER.
      Returns:
      All the rooms in the database which their status is: WAITING_FOR_NEW_PLAYER.

    • getRoom

      @GetMapping("/getRoom") @ResponseBody public Map<String,String> getRoom(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Principal principal)
      The function returns a list of all the players in the room, if the room is full, an informative message added to the JSON.
      Parameters:
      model - To add parameters to the thymeleaf.
      principal - To get info about the user.
      Returns:
      A list of the players in the room, and if the room is full.

    • getRoomCreation

      @GetMapping("/create-room") public String getRoomCreation(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The rest return a create room page.
      Parameters:
      model - To add parameters to the thymeleaf.
      Returns:
      create room page's html.

    • addRoom

      @PostMapping("/create-room") public String addRoom(@RequestParam("type") int type, Principal principal, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The function creates a new room receiving a post with the new room type.
      Parameters:
      type - The new room's type.
      principal - For info about the user.
      model - To add parameters to the thymeleaf.
      Returns:
      redirection to the wait room or the roomCreation html in case of errors.

    • wait

      @GetMapping("/wait") public String wait(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The rest returns the waiting room html.
      Parameters:
      model - To add parameters to the thymeleaf.
      Returns:
      The waiting room html.

    • enterRoom

      @GetMapping("/enter-room/{id}") public String enterRoom(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, Principal principal)
      The function adds the sender to the received id's room.
      Parameters:
      id - The room the user wanted to be added to.
      model - To add parameters to the thymeleaf.
      principal - For info about the user.
      Returns:
      HTML to the waiting room. redirect to the lobby if the addition failed.
